General.Name: Lihuayi Weiyuan Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Lihuayi Weiyuan Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of polymer materials, fine chemicals, and other products in China. The company provides phenol, acetone, bisphenol A, polycarbonate, isopropanol, and other products, as well as liquid oxygen, argon, and nitrogen products. Lihuayi Weiyuan Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Dongying, China.
